name: TidyChoice
description:
TidyChoice is a lifeline for help at home. By connecting people, TidyChoice makes it easy to find and book trusted housekeepers and carers. TidyChoice aims to revolutionise the global domestic services market. 
TidyChoice is unique in allowing customers to browse, choose and book their preferred professional so they get a tailored personal service. The platform attracts the best professionals because it optimises their earnings and reduces their costs. TidyChoice vets the best professionals, so customers get the best service.

jobs.title: Head of Marketing
jobs.description:
Job Description
TidyChoice is a fast growing technology company. We are building a leading brand in the multi-billion home care services market. We are disrupting the market with a unique online marketplace solution.
You will have broad responsibility for coordinating all marketing activities to support our growth in London and eventually scale up the business. You must have experience in multi-channel marketing and expertise in digital marketing. You should feel comfortable working in dynamic start-up environments.

Key responsibilities
•	Manage our digital marketing campaigns and social media presence
•	Help coordinate PR activities to raise brand awareness 
•	Help optimise the website for SEO and CRO
•	Create and coordinate high-quality and compelling content across a number of channels (e.g.  Blog, website, social media, email, events, sales collateral)
•	Identify, prioritise and execute affiliate marketing opportunities
•	Research new marketing opportunities and identify future service opportunities

Skills & experience
•	Minimum 3 years of experience in a fast growing B2C digital services company – marketplace business preferred
•	Expertise in digital marketing, SEO and CRO
•	Excellent writing skills, able to create compelling content
•	Quick learner able to grasp new concepts quickly without a lot of direction
•	Effective communicator
•	Creative, able to think outside the box
•	Comfortable with database technology, CRM, Excel, etc
•	Analytical with solid attention to details
•	Self-directed and organised, “can-do” attitude

Benefits
•	This is a senior position with opportunity to make a significant impact
•	You’ll develop a leadership position. The right candidate will build a business development and marketing team.
•	Equity and stock options in a high growth company
•	Work in a flexible, dynamic, friendly, multicultural and fun environment.

jobs.title: Tech start-up intern
jobs.description:
Do you want to understand how tech start-ups disrupt and outperform traditional business models?
Do you want to gain broad experience in technology, operations, human resources and customer servicing?
Would you like to test your communication, management and commercial decision-making skills?

Then the Tech Start-up intern position at TidyChoice is perfect for you.

Role
We are looking for an enthusiastic student or young graduate to join our team in London. You will be working directly with the founders, registered professionals and their customers. Among other things, you would be involved in:
•	Reviewing exception reports and executing operations
•	Direct customer contact
•	Recruiting home care professionals through interviews and reference checking
•	Optimising operations and recruitment funnel 
•	Maintaining Customer Relationship Management (CRM) and operational systems
Requirements for this position:
•	Enjoy dealing with people and making judgements about people
•	Good written and spoken English (being native speaker will be a plus)
•	Strong technology and organisational skills
•	Previous experience in operations, customer service or human resources will be also be positively considered
Benefits
At TidyChoice we offer flexibility. The terms (start, end, salary and conditions) of the job are flexible and can be adapted to the schedule and needs of the candidate, should the candidate be ideal for this position. We are a results driven start-up.
As a minimum, we pay interns travelling and daily expenses. Additional payment will be considered if the candidate has previous experience relevant to the position.
This post is suitable for students looking for a part-time job or for young graduates/undergraduates who would like to gain some commercial experience before applying for their first corporate job.

TidyChoice aim to be become the lifeline for help at home. We are the AirBnB of home care with Amazon's customer service.

jobs.title: Operations Executive
jobs.description:
Job description
The Operations Executive plays a pivotal role in the business and carries a high level of autonomy and responsibility. As well as overseeing all operational areas of the business, the role is central in supporting business growth.
The Operations Executive interfaces directly with both customers and providers and manages operations on our proprietary technology and Customer Relationship Management systems. Key responsibilities include:
•	Managing daily operations
•	Responding to inbound queries
•	Obtaining customer feedback
•	Recruiting home care professionals
•	Conducting reference checks and onboarding interviews
•	Maintaining CRM systems
Requirements
•	Desire to assume responsibility and work autonomously
•	Willingness to learn and able to learn quickly
•	Highly organised and able to juggle numerous tasks
•	Calm under pressure and emotionally intelligent
•	Efficient at resolving issues. Pragmatic decision-maker
•	Good written and spoken English (being native speaker will be a plus)
•	Enjoy dealing with people and good at making judgements about people
•	Comfortable using technology systems
•	Previous experience in operations, human resources or customer service will be also be positively considered
Remuneration
This is a full-time position. Remuneration will be £1,800 to £2,000 per calendar month depending on experience.

jobs.title: Operations Intern
jobs.description:
Internship position
Do you want an internship that provides you with broad experience and a high level of responsibility so you can learn? Are you looking for challenging, interesting and varied work? Do you want to experience a dynamic tech start-up environment? 
Then the Operations Internship position at TidyChoice is perfect for you. 
Role
We are looking for an undergraduate/graduate who wants to build broad business experience in operations, HR, business analysis and entrepreneurship. You will join our team in London and work directly with the founders. You will be a critical member of the team and have a high level of responsibility. You will interface directly with customers and providers. You will be involved in:
•	Operations
o	Executing daily operations
o	Dealing with queries from customers and providers
o	Maintaining Customer Relationship Management (CRM) and operational systems
•	Human resources
o	Recruiting providers through interviews and reference checking
o	Optimising operations and our recruitment funnel 
•	Business analysis
o	Conducting market research for product development
o	Supporting product development and launch into new verticals
o	Preparing analysis for ad hoc business projects eg pricing strategy

Requirements for this position
•	Strong communication skills. Excellent written and spoken English
•	Intellectually curious and willingness to take on new challenges
•	Interested in gaining broad business experience within a dynamic, flexible environment
•	Strong technology and organisational skills
•	Comfortable using technology systems and carrying out analysis on Excel
•	Enjoy dealing with people and making judgements about people

Benefits
At TidyChoice we offer challenging work, responsibility and flexibility. The terms (start, end and conditions) of the job are flexible and can be adapted to the schedule and needs of the candidate, should the candidate be ideal for this position. 
We pay interns on an enhanced expense basis to cover travelling and daily expenses. Additional payment will be considered if the candidate has previous experience relevant to the position.
This post is suitable for undergraduates or graduates seeking meaningful commercial experience to enhance their career prospects.

About TidyChoice
TidyChoice is a young and dynamic start-up. We will revolutionise the way people find trusted help for their homes. We are a lifeline for help at home.
Our website and mobile app allow customers to easily book available professionals for domestic services. Professionals market their services and use our tool to manage their time.
We are the AirBnB of home help with Amazon's customer service.

jobs.title: Digital marketing Intern
jobs.description:
Internship position
Do you want to put your creative writing skills as well as your analytical and business skills to the test? Would you like to gain deep marketing experience, especially in social media and PPC? Are you looking for challenging, interesting and varied work with a high level of responsibility? 
And if you want to experience a dynamic tech start-up environment, then the Marketing Internship position at TidyChoice is perfect for you. 

Role
We are looking for an undergraduate/graduate who wants to build broad marketing experience. You will join our team in London and work directly with the founders. You will be a critical member of the team and have a high level of responsibility. You will be involved in:
•	Managing pay-per-click Google, Bing and Facebook accounts
•	Implementing social media strategy and managing social media accounts
•	Creating copy for customer email marketing, newsletters and social media
•	Analysing marketing effectiveness and carrying out A/B testing
•	Supporting business projects by conducting research and analysis

Requirements for this position
•	Good understanding of Social Networks (Facebook, Twitter, Google Plus, etc.)
•	Excellent written and spoken English (being native speaker will be a plus)
•	Intellectually curious and willingness to take on new challenges
•	Comfortable using technology systems and carrying out analysis on Excel
•	Previous experience in marketing and social media will be also be positively considered

Benefits
At TidyChoice we offer challenging work, responsibility and flexibility. The terms (start, end and conditions) of the job are flexible and can be adapted to the schedule and needs of the candidate, should the candidate be ideal for this position. 
We pay interns on an enhanced expense basis to cover travelling and daily expenses. Additional payment will be considered if the candidate has previous experience relevant to the position.
This post is suitable for undergraduates or graduates seeking meaningful commercial experience to enhance their career prospects.
